 Looking Forward: Global Workforce  
 
We have the opportunity to leverage our technology and workforce to take advantage of massive data 
growth. As we move into FY2018, one of our priorities is an enhanced Focus on People. Engaging and 
developing our workforce across teams and sites, as well a s communicating regularly and openly with 
employees, are imperative to our business. Success requires an empowered workforce at all levels of the 
company, and we will focus on employee development by investing in an expanded portfolio of courses and 
seekin g opportunities to broaden the experiences of our diverse team.
